auth.joinThousands: Join thousands of patients who trust us with their healthcare management. Create your account to get started.

layout.logoutConfirmation: Are you sure you want to logout from your profile?

dashboard.welcomeMessage: Welcome to your personal health dashboard. Stay on top of your appointments and health journey.
dashboard.comprehensiveDashboard: Your comprehensive healthcare dashboard is ready. Manage appointments, access health records, and stay connected with your healthcare providers all in one place.
dashboard.quickActionsDescription: Access your most important healthcare features with one click
dashboard.doctorWelcomeMessage: Your comprehensive medical dashboard. Manage appointments, view patient information, and track your daily medical practice with advanced healthcare tools.
dashboard.clearScheduleMessage: You have a clear schedule today. Take some time to review patient records or catch up on administrative tasks.
dashboard.clearUpcomingScheduleMessage: Your upcoming schedule is clear. Use this time to prepare for future appointments or review patient cases.
dashboard.bookAppointmentDesc: Schedule a new medical appointment with available doctors and specialists. Choose your preferred time and doctor.
dashboard.myAppointmentsDesc: View and manage your upcoming and past medical appointments. Track your healthcare journey.
dashboard.healthRecordsDesc: Access your comprehensive medical history, test results, prescriptions, and health information.
dashboard.findDoctorsDesc: Browse through our network of qualified healthcare professionals and specialists.
dashboard.notificationsDesc: Stay updated with appointment reminders, health alerts, and important medical updates.
dashboard.supportCenterDesc: Get help from our dedicated support team for any questions or technical assistance.

appointments.title: Appointments
appointments.confirmCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel this appointment?
appointments.manageDescription: Manage your medical appointments, view upcoming visits, and access your consultation history
appointments.noAppointmentsInCategory: There are no appointments in the selected category. Check other views or wait for new appointments to be scheduled.
appointments.addNotesDescription: Add clinical notes, observations, or follow-up instructions for {{patientName}}.
appointments.noUpcomingAppointmentsDescription: You don't have any upcoming appointments. Book one now!
appointments.noPastAppointmentsDescription: You haven't had any appointments yet.
appointments.noCancelledAppointmentsDescription: You don't have any cancelled appointments.
appointments.noSlotsForDate: No available slots for this date.
appointments.noSlotsDescription: Dr. {{doctorName}} may not have set up their schedule for this date yet, or all slots may be booked. Please try another date or contact the doctor directly.
appointments.reasonPlaceholder: Please describe the reason for your appointment...
appointments.additionalNotesPlaceholder: Any additional information you'd like to share...
appointments.bookingFailed: Failed to book appointment. Please try again.
appointments.provideReason: Please provide a reason for the appointment.
appointments.selectSlotAndReason: Please select a time slot and provide a reason for the appointment.
appointments.slotNotAvailable: This time slot is not available for booking. Please select another slot.
appointments.noUpcomingDesc: You don't have any scheduled appointments. Book one today!

doctors.title: Doctors
doctors.findPerfectDoctorDescription: Connect with experienced healthcare professionals. Browse specializations, read reviews, and book appointments with doctors who match your needs.
doctors.adjustSearchCriteria: Try adjusting your search criteria or browse all available doctors by clearing the filters.
doctors.noDoctorsAvailable: No doctors are currently available. Please check back later or contact support.
doctors.shareExperience: Share your experience with this doctor...
doctors.beFirstToReview: Be the first to share your experience with this doctor

patients.title: Patients
patients.patientManagementDescription: View and manage your patients' records, medical history, and appointments
patients.noMedicalRecordsFound: No medical records found for this patient.

patient.medicalHistoryDescription: Access and manage your comprehensive medical records, test results, and prescriptions.

schedule.title: Schedule
schedule.scheduleManagementDescription: Manage your working hours, availability, and time slots for patient appointments
schedule.noTimeSlotsAvailable: No time slots available for the selected view. Add some schedule entries to get started.
schedule.deleteScheduleConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this schedule? This action cannot be undone.
schedule.deleteMultipleSchedulesConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {count} selected schedule(s)? Any existing appointments will be automatically cancelled and patients will be notified. This action cannot be undone.
schedule.deleteBookedScheduleConfirm: This schedule slot is currently reserved by {patientName}. Deleting it will automatically cancel the appointment and notify the patient. Are you sure you want to proceed?
schedule.cannotCreatePastSlots: Cannot create slots for past dates or times. Please select a future date and time.
schedule.endTimeAfterStart: End time must be after start time.
schedule.createNewTimeSlot: Create a new available time slot for patient appointments
schedule.configureWeekSlots: Configure your available time slots for the selected week. Use the navigation above to choose different weeks.

medicalHistory.title: Medical History
medicalHistory.noRecordsYet: You don't have any medical records yet. Upload your first record to get started.
medicalHistory.noRecordsInCategory: No records found in the selected category. Try selecting a different category or upload new records.
medicalHistory.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this record?

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.doctorDescription: Stay informed about patient appointments, schedule changes, and medical practice updates
notifications.patientDescription: Stay updated with appointment reminders, health updates, and important medical information
notifications.allCaughtUp: You're all caught up! Check back later for new notifications.
notifications.doctorNotificationsDescription: You'll receive notifications here about appointments, patient updates, and system messages.

profile.title: Profile
profile.updateAccountInfo: Update your account information and preferences
profile.loadingProfileDescription: Please wait while we fetch your information...
profile.allergiesPlaceholder: List any known allergies to medications, foods, environmental factors, etc...
profile.chronicConditionsPlaceholder: List any chronic conditions, long-term illnesses, or ongoing health issues...
profile.experiencePlaceholder: Years of experience, previous positions, certifications...
profile.currentMedicationsPlaceholder: List all current medications, dosages, and frequency...
profile.pastSurgeriesPlaceholder: List any previous surgeries, procedures, or operations with dates...
profile.familyMedicalHistoryPlaceholder: Notable family medical history including hereditary conditions, major illnesses in family members...
profile.accountActiveDescription: Your account is active and you can access all features. If you need to temporarily disable your account, you can deactivate it below.
profile.temporarilyDeactivateDescription: You can temporarily deactivate your account if you need a break. This will prevent others from booking appointments with you and limit your access to the platform.
profile.deactivateConsequence1: Your account will be temporarily disabled
profile.deactivateConsequence2: You will be automatically logged out
profile.deactivateConsequence3: Others won't be able to book appointments with you
profile.deactivateConsequence4: You can reactivate anytime by logging in again
profile.deactivateAccountDescription: This action will temporarily disable your account
profile.deactivateNote: Note: This is different from admin deactivation
profile.deactivateGoodToKnowDescription: This is different from permanently deleting your account. You can easily reactivate by simply logging in again with your existing credentials.
profile.failedToDeactivate: Failed to deactivate account. Please try again.
profile.dataProtectionDescription: Your personal and medical information is encrypted and stored securely according to healthcare privacy standards.
profile.selfDeactivationRecoveryDescription: If you deactivate your account yourself, all your data remains safe and will be restored when you log in again.
profile.adminDeactivationDescription: If an administrator deactivates your account, only they can reactivate it. Contact support for assistance.
profile.permanentDeletionDescription: If you need to permanently delete your account, please contact our support team.

about.title: About MedReserve
about.subtitle: Your trusted partner in revolutionizing healthcare accessibility and management
about.missionText1: MedReserve is committed to revolutionizing healthcare accessibility by providing a seamless platform for patients to connect with healthcare providers, manage appointments, and maintain their medical records.
about.missionText2: We believe that healthcare should be convenient, transparent, and accessible to everyone. Our platform bridges the gap between patients and healthcare providers.
about.feature1: Easy appointment booking with qualified healthcare providers
about.step1Desc: Create your account and complete your profile
about.step2Desc: Find and book appointments with healthcare providers
about.step3Desc: Track your appointments and medical history

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Have questions or need support? We're here to help you every step of the way
contact.emergencyNotice: This platform is not for emergency services
contact.faq1Q: Q: How do I book an appointment?
contact.faq1A: A: Register, browse doctors, and select your preferred time slot.
contact.faq2A: A: Yes, from your dashboard with 24h notice when possible.
contact.subject: Subject
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help you...
contact.messageSent: Thank you for your message! We will get back to you soon.

unauthorized.title: Access Denied
unauthorized.message: You don't have permission to access this page.

landing.heroSubtitle: Experience seamless healthcare management with our comprehensive medical reservation system. Book appointments, manage records, and stay connected with healthcare providers all in one place.
landing.featuresTitle: Everything You Need for Better Healthcare
landing.feature1Desc: Connect with qualified doctors and healthcare professionals for comprehensive medical care.
landing.feature2Desc: Schedule appointments with your preferred doctors at your convenience. No more waiting in long queues.
landing.feature3Desc: Access your complete medical history, prescriptions, and test results anytime, anywhere.
landing.feature4Desc: Get reminders for appointments, medication schedules, and follow-up visits.
landing.feature5Desc: Track your medications, dosages, and get refill reminders from your healthcare providers.
landing.feature6Desc: Monitor your health trends and get insights from your medical data and appointment history.
landing.featuresDescription: Our comprehensive platform provides all the tools you need to manage your health journey effectively.

quickActions.viewAppointmentsDesc: Manage your upcoming and past appointments

doctor.managePatientsDescription: Access patient records and medical history

doctor.notificationsDescription: View appointment alerts and system messages

admin.welcomeMessage: Welcome to your administrative dashboard. Monitor platform activity, manage users, and maintain platform integrity from your centralized dashboard.
admin.appointmentsOverviewDescription: Comprehensive system-wide appointment monitoring and management. Track all medical consultations across the platform ({{total}} total appointments).
admin.doctorManagementDescription: Review and approve doctor registration requests. Manage medical professional credentials and maintain platform quality standards ({{total}} total requests).
admin.commentsManagementDescription: Manage user comments and ratings across the platform. Monitor feedback quality and maintain community standards ({{total}} total comments).
admin.deleteCommentMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this comment from {{userName}}? This action cannot be undone.
